pma:database.name: new_test
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `sheet1` ( `S.No.` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `Name of Approval` varchar(97) DEFAULT NULL, `Name of Department` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `When is approval required` varchar(91) DEFAULT NULL, `Minimum eligibility for availing the Service` varchar(63) DEFAULT NULL, `As per which ACT/Rule` varchar(95) DEFAULT NULL, `Validity of Approval` varchar(21) DEFAULT NULL, `Procedure for applying` varchar(6) DEFAULT NULL, `Website` varchar(24) DEFAULT NULL, `Time limit` varchar(38) DEFAULT NULL, `Authority responsible` varchar(65) DEFAULT NULL, `Notified under Public` varchar(2) DEFAULT NULL, `Any other Special Conditions` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `Please list the type of Industry` varchar(127) DEFAULT NULL, `O` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `P` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `Q` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `R` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `S` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `T` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `U` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `V` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `W` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `X` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `Y` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `Z` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
